name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. Michael Glenn CROSBY; Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. Shelby W. Zablotny
docket_number: Appeal Nos. 38 W.D. Appeal Dkt.1998 and No. 44 W.D. Appeal Dkt.1998

judges: Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN and SAYLOR, JJ.
Justices CAPPY and CASTILLE dissent and would reach the merits of the cases.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. Michael Glenn CROSBY. Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. Shelby W. Zablotny.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Appeals dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
Justices CAPPY and CASTILLE dissent and would reach the merits of the cases.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Patrick M. Carey, Asst. Dist. Atty. Damon C. Hopkins, for appellant.
Timothy J. Lucas, Bradley H. Foulk, Erie, David Crowley, Bellefonte, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
725 A.2d 151
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. Michael Glenn CROSBY. Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. Shelby W. Zablotny.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued March 9, 1999.
Decided March 26, 1999.
Patrick M. Carey, Asst. Dist. Atty. Damon C. Hopkins, for appellant.
Timothy J. Lucas, Bradley H. Foulk, Erie, David Crowley, Bellefonte, for appellee.
Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN and SAYLOR, JJ.
